text:
Hello everyone

Is it possible to edit the meta descriptions on the individual blog-topic category pages ?

I’m using a `for` loop with a hubdb table to render job postings on our website. I’d like to sort the postings alphabetically by `category`, but when I use `sort(False, False, "category")` as defined <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters#sort|here>, the categories are ordered like so:

```Marketing
Customer Success
Engineering
Sales
Product
G&A```
Any idea how I could get those alphabetized?

Update: Got it working with `category.name`

```sort(False, False, "category.name")```
